request.description: Implement Community Forum fixes and delete feature per plan in PLAN_COMMUNITY_FORUM_FIXES_20251207. Phases: (1) Security fix - createReply isLocked check, (2) Delete feature - deleteThread/deleteReply mutations + UI, (3) UI fixes - dialog close, toasts, search, upgrade button, view debounce, (4) Performance - TODO comment for getForumStats, (5) Data cleanup - profane threads. Test with browser agents, document with Serena memory. Reference existing analysis: ANALYSIS_COMMUNITY_FORUM_20251207
